title: PCHR Organizes Workshop on Death Penalty and Fair Trial Guarantees in Palestine (PCHA - Palestinian ...
text: ( Source : PCHA - Palestinian Centre for Human Rights ) Ref: 53/ 2015 On Sunday, 11 October 2015, the Palestinian Centre for Human Rights ( PCHR ) organized a workshop on ' Death Penalty and Fair Trial Guarantees in Palestine ' in Lighthouse
